scripts.build: pnpm run --stream --filter brstm build && pnpm run --filter @kenrick95/nikku --stream build
scripts.build-gh-pages: pnpm run --stream --filter brstm build-lib && pnpm run --filter @kenrick95/nikku --stream build-gh-pages
scripts.netlify-build: cd packages/brstm && npm run build-lib && cd ../../app && npm run build
